about_the_game:
In his debut OST with the Playmakers Development Team, Nicholas O'Brien delivers the most head banging, face melting, fast paced, and samurai-shredding heavy metal soundtrack in video game history.

Perfectly capturing the adrenaline felt by the player, the music has a powerful drive the fills you with unlimited energy, and an unquenchable thirst for wall running, parrying, and dive kicking straight into hordes of enemies.

Inspired by the classic thrash metal groups of the 80’s, Armless Samurai’s OST features blazing lighting fast guitar solos, heavy chugging guitar riffs, thundering double kick drums, and…a Koto?? Yes, this traditional Japanese instrument proudly features on the soundtrack, and the Armless Samurai himself wouldn’t have it any other way.

The album features 10 tracks, available in both WAV and MP3 formats, and has a runtime of approximately 20 minutes.
